item.title: About
item.description: PhD Candidate Mathematical Genomics, University of Cambridge & Wellcome Sanger Institute Research Assistant, Walter and Eliza Hall Institute MSc Probability and Statistics, University of Melbourne Optimisation Consultant, Biarri Commercial Mathematics BSc Applied Mathematics, University of Melbourne

item.title: Publications
item.description: † = joint authorship Horesh, Gal, Grace A. Blackwell, Gerry Tonkin-Hill, Jukka Corander, Eva Heinz, and Nicholas R. Thomson. 2021. "A Comprehensive and High-Quality Collection of Escherichia Coli Genomes and Their Genes." Microbial Genomics, January. https://doi.org/10.1099/mgen.0.000499. Tonkin-Hill, Gerry†, Inigo Martincorena†, Roberto Amato, Andrew R. J. Lawson, Moritz Gerstung, Ian Johnston, David K. Jackson, et al. 2020. "Patterns of within-Host Genetic Diversity in SARS-CoV-2." Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory. bioRxiv. https://doi.org/10.1101/2020.12.23.424229. Hamilton, William L.

item.title: Software
item.description: panaroo An error aware pipeline for pangenome investigation fastBAPS A fast approximation to a Dirichlet Process Mixture model (DPM) for clustering genetic data pairSNP A set of scripts for very quickly obtaining pairwise SNP distance matrices from multiple sequence alignments using sparse matrix libraries to improve performance. Starmie R package developed with Stuart Lee to make post processing of population structure software output easier. rhierBAPS R package implementing the hierBAPS algorithm.
